topic.title: Feedback
topic.para: Any feedback is greatly appreciated, especially on what else this document should cover. General comments, errors found in the text, and any suggestions about how to improve the documentation is also welcome at documentation@balabit.com.
The source of this guide is available on GitHub. In case of the &product; guides, you can also:

listitem.para: Add a comment at the bottom of the related page in the html version of the guide.
